冲水: cung1 seoi2 - flush the water (the toilet)
冲厕所: cung1 ci3 so2 - flush the toilet
都: dou1 - all, both, even, big city
又有你: jau6 jau5 nei5 - there you are again (negative conn.)
都有你: dou1 jau5 nei5 - there you are again (no conn.)
名单又有你: meng4 daan1 jau6 jau5 nei5 - the list has you again (and you were there before too)
名单都有你: meng4 daan1 dou1 jau5 nei5 - you are included in the list
知乎: zi1 fu4 - sort of a chinese reddit
